name: Pillogrim's Duel
description:
A game inspired by Spelunky Deathmatch and Super Crate Box. Run around, pick up items and bombs in either a deathmatch, or a capture-the-teddy mode.

It's in PICO 8 - so use Pico 8 controls. Controller should be supported too. In pico-8 terms, X is bomb, or shoot. Down picks up an item

THIS IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT. AI is mediocre - best at two players. It is still possible to get stuck.
